channel.title: Sam the Coder
channel.description: Sam's blog covering a variety of different software development topics.

item.title: First Post
item.description: This is the first post on my blog! As a web developer, I wanted to create a blog that will cover a variety of different coding topics. I am…
item.content:encoded: This is the first post on my blog! As a web developer, I wanted to create a blog that will cover a variety of different coding topics. I am excited to start creating some content, and I hope it will be useful to other developers who read it. If you’re interested, come back soon! More content will be coming in the near future.
